text:
You obtain a
CRYSTAL SHARD!
You need X more.

You obtain a
CRYSTAL SHARD!
You have them
all.

You obtain an
IRON SWORD!
Press Z to use
it.

You obtain a
WOODEN BOW!
Press X to shoot
arrows.

You find a pair
of SWIMMING
TRUNKS! Now you
can swim.

You find a
SNORKEL!
Now you can go
deeper.

You obtain a
PINK SWORD!
It can break
rocks.

You find
PINK ARROWS!
They can break
rocks.

You buy an
EXTRA HEART!
You feel so
very healthy.

You buy a
QUIVER!Now you
can carry
more arrows.

You buy a
MASTER KEY!
It opens every
lock.

You buy a pair
of SPEED BOOTS!
Gotta go... no.

You obtain the
BREAKFAST! The
end is near.
